channel.title: Term-03 on Shweata's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Term-03 on Shweata's Blog

item.title: Week 14| The Young India Fellowship
item.description: Term 03 officially begins. I am excited for the courses this time. We have Microeconomics and The New Geography in the Information Age (NGIA) – a funky name but it is a course on information in the age of internet. This week features me singing, reading a lot, working on Chevening Application, spending time with the cohort and having quality time with Karthik. 2024-10-26 First day of Term 03. We had to back-to-back lectures.
